title: Show me your NON VW BUS mirrors fitted to your bus hinges

posts.content:
Hi all,

I'd like to know what's possible to fit on the hinges - ether with or without a hinge pin.

As always I encourage the absurd, don't be ashamed can be anything from vw beetle mirrors to anything non vw too.

My only aim is to see if there is anything that is far more usable than the elephant ears (which I don't like) or the round mirrors (which are useless)

Cheers!

Bushi

I have double round mirrors on each side. One of which is convex and covers all blind spots (LHD) It works very well. Before I fitted the convex mirror it was terrible, overtaking on the motorway was a lottery. I also don't like the elephant ears

It's not the best photo of the mirrors but you get the idea
